articles.description: The Three Lions trio were subjected to sickening abuse online after the final at Wembley, where they were denied from the spot in a crushing penalty shootout defeat for Gareth Southgate's men.
articles.content:
Jude Bellingham has hit out at England fans over the racial abuse of team-mates Bukayo Saka, Marcus Rashford and Jadon Sancho following last summer's Euro 2020 final.
The Three Lions trio were subje… [+4364 chars]
